name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Google Analytics upgrade message from Confluence

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the Atlassian's Confluence pages message You are using a legacy version of Google Analytics. By bruno@grange.com.br

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes the annoying footer message [You are using a legacy version of Google Analytics in Confluence which will stop working on June 30, 2023.] from atlassian.net Confluence pages right after page load. 
Only works in pages hosted at atlassian.net/wiki/*
